summary: Add some feminine, girly flying animations to be used with FNIS PCEA2
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5]RohZima - Elegant Flying Animation Set
[/size][b]

[color=#b4a7d6][s][size=3]Version 1.0 (Old) [/size][size=3]- You have an animation set to be used with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/71055/?]FNIS PCEA2[/url] to use winged flying animations for normal movement of player character. NO FLYING MOD INCLUDED (Player Hovers)[/size][/s]
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=3]
[s]Version 1.1 (Old) - [/s][/size][/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS][s]This version will improve the quality of any of the animations which are deemed to be shit.[/s][/font][/size]

[size=3]Version 1.2 (Current) - [/size][size=3]This version adds the animations for magic equipped, I will add the ritual spell shortly.[/size][/color][/b][/font][font=Comic Sans MS][size=3][b]
[/b]
[/size][/font][size=3][font=Comic Sans MS]
[u]Installation
[/u]
[/font]To install with FNIS PCEA2, after installing FNIS PCEA2 do the following:

[list=1]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]Extract my mod to your Skyrim Data folder[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]Navigate to \Data\meshes\actors\character\animations\FNIS_PCEA2[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]You will see xx_RohZima-ElegantFlyingAnimations[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]You just need to change the xx at the beginning to a number 1-9 pick one you are not using[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]Load the game and in the FNIS PCEA2 MCM menu you then check the RohZima-ElegantFlying option[/size][/color]
[*][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]That's it.[/size][/color]
[/list][color=#d9d2e9]
Recommend to use with: 

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62612/?]Animated Fairy Wings[/url] by Anton0028 
Any Levitation spell
Customisable Camera

See my sticky post for any issues and let me know if you find any knew ones or have suggestions.
[/color][/size]
[color=#b4a7d6][size=3][b]Other info

[/b][/size][/color][b][color=#d9d2e9][size=3]This can also be used as a replacer or you can use them in a flying mod if you know what you are doing. You must give credit for the latter in your mod page.

Credits

Fore - FNIS
Anton0028 - Scripts I use
TheFigment - Cmd line tools
Me - Making the animations
[/size][/color][/b]
author: RohZima
